about_the_game:
Do you want to support the development while decorating your base?
Now you can with our supporter package and take your game to next level!

Furnish your mining office or enhance your game with trees and bushes. Now you have access to roadsigns, office furniture, barrels, building materials, and much more.

Only your imagination can stop you!

The pack contains 50+ meshes including

- Roadsigns
- Roadbarriers
- Office furniture
- Porta potty
- Scrapdumper
- Gas canisters
- Barrels
- Desk and Pc
- Office chairs
- Couch and table
- Vending machine
- Parking barriers
- Trees and bushes
- Decorative water
